TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The Cow Is infected with the Black Plague!

My wish is to land on EELOO

Edited April 25, 2015 by JaydenRex

Granted, however an error in Eeeloo's terrain file corrupts your save.

I wish for an electron.

Granted. The electron electrifies you, and you die.

I wish for cake.

Granted. It contains... electrons.

I wish for a corrupted save.

Granted. Its now Uncorrupted

MAH WISH IS TO EAT A TRAIN

Granted. You forget to cook the train and get trainmonella.

I wish that this wish gained a punctuation mark at the end of it

. but your PC is corrupted for no reason

I wish for spees mahreens.

Granted. The space marines go against YOUR space army, instantly making you vulnerable.

(Sorry if it's inaccurate, I tried to research as much as I could!)

I wish I could timewarp in real life.

Granted. You can't exit the warp and end up dying of old age after 10 seconds of warping.

I wish for a cookie.

The cookie is 9 years old, and oddly green.

I wish for a aircraft carrier.

Granted. You get a dictionary thrown in with the package, which is being shipped to your doorstep.

I wish for another operable NES. I want to help them age better.
Ignore this post

You get an NES, but the NES was last used by someone who died of rabies (and you don't know this).

I wish 1.0 was released now.

Granted. Your computer explodes apon launching 1.0

My wish is for a cake

Granted. Your belly explodes upon consumption of the 1st piece of that cake.

I wish for a penny.

Granted. The penny explodes, taking away your fingers.

I wish for an explosion.

Granted. You're caught in it.

I wish for a G4 pony

Granted. NaN

I simply wish for others to get what they wanted. That would make me so happy^^

Granted. But they all die before getting it.

I wonder if my KSP game can be fixed.

Granted you now wonder for ever even forgiving after what you were wondering. It's pretty sad for you btw because it's been fixed in the meanwhile.

I wish all my forum post are moderated by moderators ; )

Edited April 28, 2015 by DuoDex
huehuehuehue

Granted. Trick is, only the super biased ones are moderating your posts, so they get removed and your account gets banned instantly!

I wish for the old aerodynamics back in 1.1! 1.0 is just to difficult!

Granted. The atmosphere is now a brick wall.

I wish for a new GameCube. Mine finally caught up with it's age.

Granted but half of it has been sold for spare parts and there's not Pokemon games on it

I wish for a master ball

You are trying to ruin my day, aren't you? Well, let's have Kurt modify your ball in a few ways... [good god that's evil]

I wish for the next poster to not be the same person from within the last 4 posts.

granted but even if you don't get why it's true

i wish i could go back star at the sky and fauna and flora with my autist friend and brother of hearth like last week insteed of something else...
